scripts.db: docker run --name cs_pg --rm -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=admin -p 8001:5432 -d postgres:latest && docker run --name cs_mysql --rm -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=admin -e MYSQL_DATABASE=db -e MYSQL_USER=admin -e MYSQL_PASSWORD=admin -p 8002:3306 -d mysql:latest
scripts.db:stop: docker stop cs_pg && docker stop cs_mysql
scripts.test:all: npm run test:sqlite && npm run test:postgres && npm run test:mysql
